Heading: States where killing occurred
Value: New York, North Carolina, South Carolina

Heading: Birth order
Value: 1st of 2 (4 if include 1 step-brother and 1 half-brother)

Heading: Family event
Value: Divorce and house fire, set by father

Heading: Problems in school?
Value: Many problems, correlated with stress at home

Heading: Physically attractive?
Value: Average, chunky with floppy long hair

Heading: Head injury?
Value: Claims of memory loss and blackouts

Heading: Physically abused?
Value: Abused since birth by father, severe problems associated

Heading: Psychologically abused?
Value: Never understood what he did wrong, severely traumatized

Heading: Grades in school
Value: Average student until middle school, high school drop out

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Value: Claims he did but refused job offer

Heading: Types of jobs worked
Value: Mostly trucking. Occasional odd jobs.  Often fired due to drugs.

Heading: Marital status
Value: Divorced, multiple girlfriends at various times

Heading: Living with
Value: Transient. Different people at different times: spouse, step-brother, brother, mother, girlfriend; wherever he was at the time

Heading: Been to a psychologist?
Value: Yes, multiple instances. Evaluated as a child and teenager.

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Yes, anything that could get his mother’s attention: money, items, mostly

Heading: Spend time in jail?
Value: Yes for stealing and going AWOL

Heading: Spend time in prison?
Value: Not until after apprehension for series

Heading: Number of victims
Value: 4 confirmed victims, Warren claimed 8, those claims were not substantiated

Heading: Victim type
Value: Young, good-looking women, friends and acquaintances

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Date of first kill in series
Date of final kill in series
Weapon
Value: Fists and hands.  Gun used to threaten and control

Heading: Was gun used?
Value: Yes, to control and subdue victims.

Heading: How close did killer live?
Value: Usually killed close to where he was staying at the time, didn’t just live at one place, kind of a traveler

Heading: Location of first contact
Value: Met Johnson at a picnic. Allegedly met Vineyard at a bar. Met Hurley at the Juvenile Evaluation Center. Happened upon Gray, broken down on the side of the road.

Heading: Location of killing
Value: Johnson – in a soccer field, Vineyard – deserted spot near old military barracks, Hurley – in her home, Gray – in car

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Victim abducted or killed at contact?
Value: Three of four killed at contact. One, (Gray) had abduction qualities

Heading: Rape?
Value: Some of the victims, some began as consensual sex

Heading: Tortured victims?
Value: Gray was severely beaten prior to death.

Heading: Quick & efficient?
Value: No, the ME said it took 4 minutes of pressure to strangle the victims

Heading: Bound the victims?
Value: Bound the hands of one victim

Heading: Took totem – personal item
Value: Yes, he had Hurley’s purse in his vehicle

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Moved, buried
Value: Moved and attempted to hide,  most dumped in water, Hurley buried
